wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.wrappers.imagej.core

Class HistogramIJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.histogram.HistogramBaseGeneric
      • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.wrappers.imagej.core.HistogramIJ
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Histogram, HistogramThresholding

    public class HistogramIJ
extends HistogramBaseGeneric
implements HistogramThresholding
    This class is the ImageJ based extension of the abstract class Histogram
    Author:
    remy

      • getBinarizationThreshold

        public int getBinarizationThreshold(ThresholdingOption method)
        Description copied from interface: HistogramThresholding
        Computes the grey level threshold value for binarizing an image using this instance's histogram. Different method can be used to compute the threshold.
        Specified by:
        getBinarizationThreshold in interface Histogram
        Specified by:
        getBinarizationThreshold in interface HistogramThresholding
        Parameters:
        method - the thresholding method
        Returns:
        the threshold for the image
